About Holes 18 Type Public Par 72 Length 7006 yards Slope 135 Rating 73.2 The 18-hole Falcon's Fire Golf Club in Kissimmee, FL is a public golf course that opened in 1993. Designed by Rees Jones and Greg Muirhead, Falcon's Fire Golf Club measures 7006 yards from the longest tees and has a slope rating of 135 and a 73.2 USGA rating. The course features 4 sets of tees for different skill levels. The greens are tifdwarf bermuda and the fairways are bermuda grass. Falcon's Fire, a Rees Jones and Greg Muirhead signature masterpiece, is typically wide open, however, shot accuracy is essential. Fairways and greens are well bunkered, and water hazards are a common occurrence. Unfortunately the course needs to invest in a little thing called drainage. It was wet as expected considering it rained the night before. It's quite obvious they need to bring a drainage engineer into the fold. If they could do this, the course would be my favorite in the area. Conditions Fair Value Average Layout Excellent Friendliness Good Pace Average Amenities Good Difficulty Somewhat Challenging Helpful (0) Not Helpful (0) Comment Share Report hamptongolf Commented on 09/01/2025 Good afternoon, Thank you very much for taking the time to provide feedback about your experience. Your comments and feedback are extremely important to us. We appreciate you pointing out the positive aspects of your experience, and appreciate even more your feedback on how we may improve. We place a premium on our staff’s attentiveness and diligence when it comes to each one of our customers and their individual experiences, for which we are solely responsible. We are hard at work attending to your grievances, and hope to receive the opportunity to impress you in the future. Warmest regards, Hampton Golf Management Helpful (0) Not Helpful (0) Share Report oD6Ka5OQnIbA5JWBN8UR Played On 08/24/2025 Reviews 2 Skill Intermediate Plays A few times a week 2.0 First Time Playing Really rough shape I play a lot of cheap golf courses and was expecting a little upgrade from I’m used to, sadly it was the opposite. Most bunkers had knee deep puddles that looked they have been that way for a long time with grass growing it. Tons of weeds everywhere. The fairways were extremely sparse and muddy. Greens were better than fairways but not full with lots of sandy patches. Starter was sending out multiple groups of 2 behind a slow group of 4. All of the twosome’s were jammed up. Unless you can get a round for $15 I’d pass. Tons of better options. I wouldn’t play it again unless it hasn’t rained in the past 2 months. Conditions Fair Value Fair Layout Average Friendliness Good Pace Poor Amenities Poor Helpful (0) Not Helpful (0) Comment Share Report hamptongolf Commented on 08/24/2025 Good afternoon, We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the course conditions during your visit. Please email us at info@hampton.golf so we can discuss your experience and concerns in more detail. Your feedback is important to us. Our sincerest regards, Hampton Golf Management Helpful (0) Not Helpful (0) Share Report luisrafaelpr Played On 08/24/2025 Reviews 1 Skill Beginner Plays A few times a week 1.0 Previously Played Manager was Rude Shop was close when we arrived in the morning , no staff. The gentleman that had us go out without checking in said we’d be charged at the turn or the round would be free . No one informed us or gave us next steps . At the end of the round as I usually dominated home. Tyler call me rude and sarcastic treating me like a criminal. I proceeded to call him out on it and he said he would charge my card on file which I agreed to . He called me back in rude and sarcastic treating me like a non paying criminal when it was their fault that no one showed up to open up the pro shop. No apologies , just rude behavior and terrible customer service . He said he was the manager and he reported to no one , that I gave to reach out to the Hampton direction with any complaints. I have no problem paying for golf, I love golf and payed a lot of money playing… don’t need to be treated like a criminal . Dude has a superiority complex. Conditions Fair Value Poor Layout Good Friendliness Poor Pace Average Amenities Poor Helpful (0) Not Helpful (0) Comment Share Report hamptongolf Commented on 08/24/2025 Good afternoon, We regret to hear about your experience with our staff. Providing exceptional customer service is a top priority for us, and we are disappointed to hear that we fell short of your expectations. We will address this internally to ensure that all our staff are providing courteous and attentive service to all our guests. Please get in touch with us at info@hampton.golf to discuss this matter in greater detail. We hope to resolve this matter promptly. Our sincerest regards, Hampton Golf Management Helpful (0) Not Helpful (0) Share Report Pierreperry14 Played On 08/23/2025 Reviews 2 Skill Intermediate Plays Once a week 1.0 Previously Played Absolute scam would not recommend this course to anyone in its current condition. The fairways were completely flooded, every bunker looked like a pond, and balls that were clearly hit in the fairway were getting lost in standing water. Honestly, the course was unplayable and should not have been open. On top of that, it was cart path only, which was never disclosed before arrival. We were only able to get through 8 holes before the rain made it impossible to continue. When I asked the manager about a refund, I was told they “knew it was going to be wet.” Instead of offering a proper rain check, they would only give a discount voucher that expires within the week, which is unreasonable for anyone who doesn’t live right around the corner. Overall, very disappointing experience, poor customer service, and a waste of money. Save yourself the frustration and play somewhere else until this course fixes both the conditions and the way they treat paying customers Conditions Poor Value Poor Layout Excellent Friendliness Fair Pace Poor Amenities Poor Helpful (0) Not Helpful (0) Comment Share Report hamptongolf Commented on 08/24/2025 Good afternoon, Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent experience with us. Every time I play here it is the same problem. Course is always soggy. Some traps were filled with water. Small portions of the fairway are unplayable due to extremely wet conditions. The course layout is really nice and the staff are polite and friendly but I never seem to find the course in good playing condition. I live nearby and have tried different times of the year but the course is never up to par. Best regards, Hampton Golf Management Helpful (0) Not Helpful (0) Share Report ocsportsnut Played On 07/29/2025 Reviews 33 Handicap 15-19 Skill Intermediate Plays Once a month I Recommend This Course 4.0 Previously Played Hot weather Used cart It's not horrible, but it's been in better shape Falcon's Fire is one of my favorite courses to play in Central Florida and it's usually in tip-top shape, but I was somewhat disappointed this time. I'm sure the issues had a lot to do with the weather, so I'm willing to give them a pass until Fall. The big issues were the greens as several are under repair. The greens were also incredibly slow and again, this could be because of the extremely hot weather and not wanting them to burn out. The only other thing that was really bad was, not refreshment cart on the course, luckily I'm always prepared for that now so I bring my own small cooler with Gatorade, but the two guys I was paired up with weren't prepared. Our tee time was 9:15 we could tell the greens were cut but I have played many courses in Florida and I have seen fairways cut shorter. And 4 greens were ground under repair.Now the fairways were being cut so much grass clipping at times hard to find your ball in the fairway. The rough on the front 9 didn’t look like it had been cut in a week and could tell the last time the bunkers were raked. Lot better course to play in central Florida for 48.00 Conditions Poor Value Poor Layout Good Friendliness Good Pace Average Amenities Average Helpful (0) Not Helpful (0) Comment Share Report hamptongolf Commented on 07/28/2025 Good morning, We're sorry to hear that you found the course conditions less than satisfactory.
